languages.text: {n}Завершив песнь, рыжеволосый саркастично ухмыляется.{/n} "Да ты, вижу, не скьяльд. Держу пари, друзья твои ценят тебя не за висы, что ты читаешь им у очага".
{n}The red-haired warrior finishes his song and laughs sarcastically.{/n} "You are no skjald, I see. It is not for your fireside verses that your friends esteem you, I wager."
languages.original_text: {n}Завершив песнь, рыжеволосый саркастично ухмыляется.{/n} "Да ты, вижу, не скьяльд. Держу пари, друзья твои ценят тебя не за висы, что ты читаешь им у очага".

traits.locale_text: {n}The red-haired warrior finishes his song and laughs sarcastically.{/n} "You are no skjald, I see. It is not for your fireside visur that your friends esteem you, I wager."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}这位红发战士唱完了歌之后，讽刺地大笑起来。{/n}“看得出来，你没有吟游诗人的天赋。我敢打赌，你的朋友之所以对你心怀敬意，并不是因为你在火炉边美妙的歌声。”
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior finishes his song and laughs sarcastically.{/n} "You are no skjald, I see. It is not for your fireside verses that your friends esteem you, I wager."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位红发战士唱完了歌之后，讽刺地大笑起来。{/n}“看得出来，你没有吟游诗人的天赋。我敢打赌，你的朋友之所以对你心怀敬意，并不是因为你在火炉边美妙的歌声。”
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}赤髪の戦士は歌い終え、皮肉めいた笑い声を上げた。{/n}「あんたがスキャルドではないのは明らかだ。あんたの仲間たちは、その詩を慕ってついてきているわけではないんだな」
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior finishes his song and laughs sarcastically.{/n} "You are no skjald, I see. It is not for your fireside verses that your friends esteem you, I wager."

traits.locale_text: {n}赤髪の戦士は歌い終え、皮肉めいた笑い声を上げた。{/n}「あんたがスキャルドではないのは明らかだ。あんたの仲間たちは、その詩を慕ってついてきているわけではないんだな」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}El guerrero pelirrojo termina de cantar y ríe, sarcástico.{/n} «Veo que no es precisamente un{mf||a} skjald. No sé qué valoran de usted sus amistades, pero apostaría a que no son sus poemas».
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior finishes his song and laughs sarcastically.{/n} "You are no skjald, I see. It is not for your fireside verses that your friends esteem you, I wager."

traits.locale_text: {n}El guerrero pelirrojo termina de cantar y ríe, sarcástico.{/n} «Veo que no es precisamente un{mf||a} skjald. No sé qué valoran de usted sus amistades, pero apostaría a que no son sus visur».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Le guerrier aux cheveux roux achève son chant et éclate d'un rire sarcastique.{/n} « Je vois que vous n'êtes pas un skjald. J'imagine que si vos amis vous estiment, ce n'est pas pour votre talent de poète. »
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior finishes his song and laughs sarcastically.{/n} "You are no skjald, I see. It is not for your fireside verses that your friends esteem you, I wager."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le guerrier aux cheveux roux achève son chant et éclate d'un rire sarcastique.{/n} « Je vois que vous n'êtes pas un skjald. J'imagine que si vos amis vous estiment, ce n'est pas pour votre talent à composer des vísur. »
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Der rothaarige Krieger beendet sein Lied und lacht sarkastisch.{/n} "Wie ich höre, seid Ihr kein Skalde. Ich wette, Eure Freunde schätzen Euch nicht wegen Eurer Verse am Kamin."
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior finishes his song and laughs sarcastically.{/n} "You are no skjald, I see. It is not for your fireside verses that your friends esteem you, I wager."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der rothaarige Krieger beendet sein Lied und lacht sarkastisch.{/n} "Wie ich höre, seid Ihr kein Skalde. Ich wette, Eure Freunde schätzen Euch nicht wegen Eurer Visur am Kamin."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior finishes his song and laughs sarcastically.{/n} "You are no skjald, I see. It is not for your fireside verses that your friends esteem you, I wager."

languages.text: {n}Kızıl saçlı savaşçı, şarkısını bitirerek alay dolu bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Görüyorum ki sen skjald filan değilsin. Dostlarının sana duyduğu saygının, ateş başında okuduğun mısralardan gelmediğinin iddiasına varım."
languages.original_text: {n}The red-haired warrior finishes his song and laughs sarcastically.{/n} "You are no skjald, I see. It is not for your fireside verses that your friends esteem you, I wager."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kızıl saçlı savaşçı, şarkısını bitirerek alay dolu bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Görüyorum ki sen skjald filan değilsin. Dostlarının sana duyduğu saygının ateş başında okuduğun mısralardan gelmediğinin iddiasına varım."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
